sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { GraduationCap, FileText, Download, ExternalLink, Search, Filter, BookOpen, Award, Users, Calendar } from 'lucide-react'; const ScholarshipResources = () => { const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('all'); const scholarships = [ { id: 1, name: "National Scholarship Portal", category: "General", description: "Central government scholarships for students from economically weaker sections", eligibility: [ "Family income below ₹8 lakh per annum", "Studying in recognized institutions", "Valid caste certificate (if applicable)" ], documents: [ "Income Certificate", "Caste Certificate", "Domicile Certificate", "Mark Sheets", "Bank Account Details", "Aadhaar Card" ], deadline: "2024-03-31", amount: "Up to ₹20,000 per year", officialLink: "https://scholarships.gov.in", status: "active" }, { id: 2, name: "PM Scholarship for RPF/RPSF", category: "Defense", description: "Scholarship for children of Railway Protection Force personnel", eligibility: [ "Children of RPF/RPSF personnel", "Studying in recognized institutions", "Family income below ₹6 lakh per annum" ], documents: [ "Service Certificate of Parent", "Income Certificate", "Mark Sheets", "Bank Account Details", "Aadhaar Card" ], deadline: "2024-04-15", amount: "₹2,000 per month", officialLink: "https://indianrailways.gov.in", status: "active" }, { id: 3, name: "Post Matric Scholarship for SC Students", category: "SC/ST", description: "Scholarship for Scheduled Caste students pursuing higher education", eligibility: [ "Scheduled Caste students", "Studying in recognized institutions", "Family income below ₹2.5 lakh per annum" ], documents: [ "Caste Certificate", "Income Certificate", "Domicile Certificate", "Mark Sheets", "Bank Account Details", "Aadhaar Card" ], deadline: "2024-03-31", amount: "Full tuition fee + maintenance allowance", officialLink: "https://socialjustice.gov.in", status: "active" }, { id: 4, name: "Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for Professional and Technical Courses", category: "Technical", description: "Scholarship for students pursuing professional and technical courses", eligibility: [ "Family income below ₹6 lakh per annum", "Studying in recognized technical institutions", "Merit-based selection" ], documents: [ "Income Certificate", "Mark Sheets", "Admission Letter", "Bank Account Details", "Aadhaar Card", "Caste Certificate (if applicable)" ], deadline: "2024-04-30", amount: "Up to ₹40,000 per year", officialLink: "https://mhrd.gov.in", status: "active" } ]; const categories = [ { id: 'all', name: 'All Categories' }, { id: 'general', name: 'General' }, { id: 'sc/st', name: 'SC/ST' }, { id: 'defense', name: 'Defense' }, { id: 'technical', name: 'Technical' }, { id: 'minority', name: 'Minority' } ]; const filteredScholarships = scholarships.filter(scholarship => { const matchesSearch = scholarship.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || scholarship.description.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()); const matchesCategory = selectedCategory === 'all' || scholarship.category.toLowerCase() === selectedCategory; return matchesSearch && matchesCategory; }); const downloadDocument = (documentName) => { // In a real app, this would download the actual document alert(`Downloading ${documentName}...`); }; return (

Scholarship Resources

Find scholarships, view documents, and check eligibility requirements

setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} />
{filteredScholarships.map((scholarship) => (

{scholarship.name}

{scholarship.category}
{scholarship.amount}

{scholarship.description}

Deadline: {scholarship.deadline}
Status: {scholarship.status}

Eligibility Criteria

    {scholarship.eligibility.map((criteria, index) => (
  • {criteria}
    • ))}

Required Documents

{scholarship.documents.map((doc, index) => (
{doc}
))}
Apply Now
))}
{filteredScholarships.length === 0 && (

No Scholarships Found

Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find relevant scholarships.

)}

Important Information

Application Process

Most scholarships require online application through official portals. Keep all documents ready before applying.

Document Verification

Ensure all documents are self-attested and uploaded in the correct format as specified by the scholarship.

Deadlines

Pay attention to application deadlines. Late applications are usually not accepted.

); }; export default ScholarshipResources;
